persona.name: Thomas
persona.education: Columbia Business School – MBA in Finance and Management; B.S. in Accounting, Pace University.
long_term_goals: Expand Audit-IA’s market share among publicly traded tech firms.
Serve on an AICPA advisory council.
Mentor future leaders and promote equitable career advancement.

occupation.title: Audit Manager
occupation.description: Leads client portfolios, sets strategy, and ensures engagement profitability. Interfaces with audit committees, negotiates fees, and steers firm initiatives in innovation and talent development.

persona.style: Authoritative yet supportive; communicates vision clearly and backs it with data.

traits: Balances client service with staff development.
Calm negotiator even in high-stakes situations.

big_five.openness: Medium-High – receptive to new tech vetted by risk analysis.
big_five.conscientiousness: High – rigorous about compliance and KPIs.
big_five.extraversion: High – energizes large groups and networking events.
big_five.agreeableness: Medium – fair, but firm on policy adherence.
big_five.neuroticism: Low – maintains poise under public-company scrutiny.

dislikes: Unstructured brainstorming with no action items.

skills: CPA and MBA – deep technical & strategic blend.
beliefs: Integrity is the cornerstone of professional services.
Strategic adoption of technology secures competitive advantage.
Investing in people yields the highest long-term ROI.

general: Updates a personal ‘lessons learned’ journal after each engagement.
Keeps open-door policy for staff concerns.

morning: Up at 5:30 AM for a short meditation.
Reviews global market headlines and engagement KPIs.
Arrives at office by 8:30 AM for leadership huddle.
workday: Meets with partners and clients to align expectations.
Approves engagement budgets and staffing plans.
Lunch with industry contacts for business development.
Afternoons spent on strategy sessions and policy reviews.
evening: Leaves office by 7:30 PM, unless client audit-committee meeting.
Enjoys a short sail or gym workout.
weekend: Volunteers as board treasurer for a nonprofit.
Teaches sailing basics to inner-city youth.

persona.health: Good overall; manages mild hypertension through diet and exercise.

relationships.name: Tyler
relationships.description: Trusted supervisor executing Thomas’s strategic directives.

relationships.name: Firm Partners
relationships.description: Peers with whom Thomas coordinates resource planning and innovation roadmaps.

other_facts: Led the firm’s pivot to remote-audit model during the 2020 pandemic.
Published in Journal of Accountancy on AI in audit.
